text: UMvelinqangi wabenzela isibonelo labo abangakholwanga, unkosikazikaNowakanyenonkosikazikaLothi, babengaphansi kwezinceku ezimbili, ezincekwini zethu ezilungileyo ngakho- ke womabili (amakhosikazi) ayengathembekanga ngakho- ke womabili abawuzuzelanga lutho umphefumulo wabo ukubhekana noMvelinqangi futhi kwathiwa, “ngenani emlilweni kanye nabangenayo”
